chapter.title: Adjusting Session Timeouts
chapter.para: The default &PRODUCTABBR; configuration utilizes a timeout of 5 minutes, set in milliseconds. These values can be easily changed in order to permit an operator of the platform to adjust the session timeouts to meet operational requirements.
This value can be set for the API via the sli.session.length property.
In the above example, the setting is the 5 minute default, or 5 minutes * 60 seconds * 1000, which equals 300000 milliseconds.
To set this value to one hour, set it to the example below, or 60 minutes * 60 seconds * 1000, which equals 3600000 milliseconds.
